CustomField.description: The Fielo template containing the content for the Transactional Email associated with an Email Alert. Fielo Email Templates are configurable from a Program, Promotion or Challenge record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the Fielo template containing the content for the Transactional Email associated with this Email Alert. Fielo Email Templates are configurable from a Program, Promotion or Challenge record.
CustomField.label: Email Template
